timerReset: Just so you know, changing your program will reset your timers.
waitForRemoveFoodMessage: Great news! Your food is ready.
guideSyncRetry: Blargh, this dang guide won’t download. Try again?
convertedTooHigh: That would have converted to {convertedFahrenheit} °F and that's too high, buddy.
convertedTooLow: That would have converted to {convertedCelsius} °C and that's too low, buddy.
rangeTooLowFahrenheit: Please enter a temperature no lower than {minimumFahrenheit} °F.
rangeTooLowCelsius: Please enter a temperature no lower than {minimumCelsius} °C.
tempRangeMsgFahrenheit: Please enter a temperature no greater than {maximumFahrenheit} °F.
tempRangeMsgCelsius: Please enter a temperature no greater than {maximumCelsius} °C.
tempSwitchMsg: Smartypants Joule can autodetect °C or °F when you enter a temperature.
startJouleBelow: Set the temperature to preheat your water.
